item.title: Julie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How do you spell 'love'?" - Piglet "You don't spell it...you feel it." - Pooh" -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Julie add a quote by Jacqueline Kelly
item.description: "One day I would have all the books in the world, shelves and shelves of them. I would live my life in a tower of books. I would read all day long and eat peaches. And if any young knights in armor dared to come calling on their white chargers and plead with me to let down my hair, I would pelt them with peach pits until they went home." -- Jacqueline Kelly

item.title: Julie add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Julie add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I'm little but I'm old." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Julie add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Cecil Jacobs is a big wet hen!" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Not my daughter, you bitch!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You're a prefect? Oh Ronnie! That's everyone in the family!" "What are Fred and I? Next door neighbors?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just then Neville caused a slight diversion by turning into a large canary." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Once again, you show all the sensitivity of a blunt axe." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry looked around; there was Ginny running toward him; she had a hard blazing look in her face as she threw her arms around him. And without thinking, without planning it, without worrying about the fact that fifty people were watching, Harry kissed her. After several long moments, or it might have been half an hour-or possibly several sunlit days- they broke apart." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Julie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
